content.question:
Directions: Read each question carefully and write your responses in the Section I, Part B: Short Answer booklet on the lined pages provided for that question.

Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. You may plan your answers in this exam booklet, but no credit will be given for notes written in this booklet. Only your responses on the designated pages of the Section I, Part B: Short Answer booklet will be scored.

Using the graph and ,answer (a), (b), and (c).

Briefly explain how ONE major historical factor contributed to the change depicted on the graph.

Briefly explain ONE specific historical effect that resulted from the change depicted on the graph.

Briefly explain ANOTHER specific historical effect that resulted from the change depicted on the graph.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
